reviews.review: Отличный Co-op survial horror  играть с друзьями бесценно. Отражая бесконечные волны мутантов или же выполняя задачи ,эта игра дарит массу впечатлений!
with this game, the zombies DO come , so be ready for that to say the least. just my opinion but take it as you will.

Holy fuck you don't have this game? Get this game! You might've been like me who thought it was just a l4d clone, no you're wrong. Unlike left 4 dead 2 which gets you with cheap ass tricks, you know what you're getting into here. If you like to work as a team, gather up ammo like a baws, and then have great aim and tactics, then have it all go to hell in about 5 seconds while dog things and invisible chicks stick their paws and nails up your butthole and you and your buddies hold hands while you cry and wish for it all to be over, then this is the game for you.

8 new buttholes out of 10
Very underrated!

Начнём с того, что игре уже 5 лет, и изначально она даже самостоятельной игрой-то не была - всего лишь мод для Unreal Tournament. Тем не менее, со временем модификация была выпущена в виде игры, которую вы видите перед собой.
Стоит сказать пару слов о сюжете: его нет. Ну, то есть, формально он присутствует и может быть рассказан в паре предложений о том, что из под контроля корпорации Horzine вырвались орды клонов, созданных по заказу британского Министерства Обороны, и теперь мутанты вырезают Лондон и окрестности, а вы - один из тех людей, кто им противостоит.
Это не Left4Dead - зомби здесь не слепые и найдут вас, даже если вы будете сидеть абсолютно неподвижно. Безопасных мест на картах нет, есть лишь те, где монстрам сложнее зайти со спины.
К минусам игры стоит отнести устаревший движок, наличие багов на новых картах и очень высокий порог вхождения.
Про сложность стоит рассказать отдельно. Все игры от Tripwire Interactive отличаются высокой степенью хардкорости. Добротно сделанные модели оружия, конечно, несколько отличаются от реальных образцов по убойной силе (пистолет Т-9 наносит урона больше, чем автомат системы bull-pup!), однако, прицел появляется перед глазами игрока только в том случае, если таковой имеется у оружия и нажата кнопка прицеливания. Монстры прут со всех сторон, и новички по началу пытаются спрятаться или убежать, броня не очень крепка, а непрокачанные навыки не дают практически никаких преимуществ. Одним словом, если вы привыкли играть в игры, где без вас битва за планету не сдвинется с мёртвой точки, то эта игра не для вас. Выжить в одиночку здесь крайне сложно, а поначалу - просто невозможно.
Именно командный дух в первую очередь добавляет баллов этой игре. Во-вторых, к плюсам следует отнести регулярно выходящие обновления, добавляющие в игру новое оружие, скины и карты. Начиная с зимнего обновления 2014 появились (официально) карты, на которых нужно не просто покрошить монстров в мелкую капусту, а выполнить определённое задание. В игре можно прокачивать навыки и получать огромное количество достижений Steam.
ZOMBIES ZOMBIES ZOMBIES ZOMBIES ZOMBIES! Is there anything else that needs to be said?
Кровь, Мясо и Беспощадные Чудовища ждут тебя в этой игре. (9/10)
1 of the best CO-OP horror games ever.

Si vous recherchez un jeu ou l'on déglingue du zombie, ce jeu est fait pour vous. A savoir qu'il est très différent de Left 4 Dead, donc non comparable (HUD, gameplay, maps...) A prendre de préférence pour le multijoueurs, de plus les maps des joueurs sont très varié. Des serveurs qui ne lagent pas, un jeu fluide et des ralentis, sont agréable à voir. Petit bémol un ou deux pack de carte à télécharger pour avoir le contenu complet du jeu. Des surprises au niveaux des skins sont au rendez-vous au moment des fêtes.
Myascoo.

Absolute. Pure. Fun. 

If you came from any FPS Arena, you will feel quite at home. The game is based on 7 park levels (1-6), and game sessions difficulty level (beginner, normal, hard, suicidial, Hell on Earth): you can choose which level fits your skill and enjoy killing zeds at fast rate with short breaks of 1 minute (1.30 on beginner) to buy and sell weapons and stuff. 

There isn't a lot of variety in the action (kill zeds/earn money/buy weapons), but the overall immediate fun and maps variety really make this game shine.

Bottom line: Brit slang ("You, Gormless Tosser!)
this is the best survival game

Killing Floor is a Horror-Themed Co-Op where you must hold your ground against hordes of mutated zombies. Has a good a enemy variation and a lot of weapons to it along with many classes. It's also mod-supported and the developers release free updates of which include new content. If you're gonna buy DLC for this game but you're a little tight on cash, then I suggest just buying the Community Pack which includes new weapons. I recommend it!

Killing Floor is a cooperative wave-based shooter which features up to six players working together to take on up to 11 waves of opponents. Unlike other cooperative "zombie shooters," this game does not reward the soloist; instead often resulting in other players seeing the message "[this guy] was killed by [this thing]" and occasionally sparking a "rage quit." But this does not mean the game is not enjoyable; in fact quite to the contrary. The necessity of teamwork really brings the entire game together and gives you lots of reasons to experiment and work with the different classes.

Of the seven classes available, you will often see the server divided into four or five of them; with at least one medic if the team is to survive. Each class not only benefits the player but forms a perfect synergy with the others and creates a real squadron feeling to the entire game. While the game rewards a balanced team where everyone plays to their strengths; it also works to the contrary and punishes those who don't work together or are glad to abandon their team-mate's sides.

Weapons are widely varied and mostly benefit from their specific perks (Commando class users benefit from perks boosting the effectiveness of Assault/Battle Rifles; for example) but aren't exclusive to those classes. A demolitions user isn't limited to just explosives; while a medic can just as happily carry a shotgun, which benefits the players greatly. While classes do help, it isn't uncommon to see people branching out with their weapons in order to keep the benefits of one class while levelling their progress towards another (you don't need to be a specific class to earn progress in it). There are a wide variety of weapons available, including fire axes; handguns; crossbows; grenade launchers; shotguns; assault rifles and even medic guns which allow the user to heal players from a distance by firing medical darts with the guns secondary fire and EVERYONE has access to that most sacred of crowd control methods: the Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch (okay, maybe I exaggerate... Maybe it's just a standard fragmentation grenade, but one can dream?).

In terms of maps, in addition to the original maps included in the release; subsequent FREE map releases have increased the map count from the original five to the current twenty-eight official maps; which means the game has at least 560% more content than it did, not counting the new weapons or events which run every so often. Games can range from the confined corridors of the Biotics Lab, to the open streets of West London, even stretching as far (and obscurely) as the Evil Santa's Lair!
There'll be at least one map which ought to bring you some enjoyment; although each map is designed in such a charming way that the tactics can be transferred from one to the next; so long as you find the right spot to use the old tactic.

Enemy variety is something which is important, but this game doesn't offer hundreds of unique enemies, or procedural spawning. It's not that they aren't good ideas, but rather that they're just unnecessary in this game. The enemies come at you wave after wave and while they start spawning undoubtedly tougher enemies, they still give you that bit of cannon fodder to distract you. The cannon fodder though, should be taken seriously in every case. Even the clots (most likely the first specimen you'll ever encounter; at least for your sake I hope so) can take down an experienced player if they don't pay attention. Every enemy has a special ability, which can range from the nuisance of the clots grabbing you and stopping you from moving to the Fleshpound's "rage mode," which can reduce even the most dedicated Macho Man Randy Savage enthusiasts to a quivering pile of diuretic mound of man-flesh in only a few unstructured (and oddly effeminate scream filled) seconds.
But no specimen is above being pulverised by a well-oiled machine, which can come from even the most ragtag band of misfits.


All in all, this game hasn't changed much from it's 2005 release as a standalone mod for Unreal Tournament 2004; but this is in no way to it's detriment. In fact, it retains the wonderful charm of the mod but with the added bonus of so much free content (yes, there's paid DLC; but considering how much free stuff has been added, I can't say that they haven't earned the right to release it) and the wonderful balancing of every aspect of the game; the game still earns regular playtime from myself (having been a player since I first downloaded 1.0 back in 2006; back when it was much grimier) and will continue to do so. If your computer was good enough to run Unreal Tournament 2004 back in the day; I fail to see a reason why you'd NOT wish to purchase this title.

Oh and to top it off, if achievements are your thing; get ready to sink a tremendous amount of time into earning all 252 and counting!

Sempre fui fã da série Left4Dead, mas depois que eu joguei Killing Floor eu fiquei maluco.

A dificuldade colocada em Killing Floor é surreal, fora que tem o sistema de perks que eu achei sensacional.

Não tem como fazer um comparativo entre L4D e KF, é claro que os dois são "FPSZ", mas são bem diferentes em jogabilidade, recomendo ambos.

Dopo svariate ore di gioco mi sento pronto a consigliare Killing Floor. Questo gioco appartiene al genere Survival Horror Co-Op e lo ritengo uno dei giochi meglio riusciti sul mercato. Nonostante le meccaniche di gioco relativamente semplici Killing Floor sarà in grado di regalarvi ore di divertimento da soli o in compagnia, ci vuole un po' per prenderci la mano, ma una volta imparato a giocare risulta un fantastico passatempo, leggero e non troppo impegnativo.

So yes, this game is very, very rough. The menus and graphics totally scream "Unreal Tournament mod!". Which, hey, that's what this game is based on! It is a very different experience from Left 4 Dead, much more of an arena, kill everything to win sort of thing. It has some perks to choose from and plenty of weapons to switch up your game style. The game can be brutally difficult, but the steep learning curve is all part of the fun. Pick this game up solo or with some buddies, and you're bound to have a good time.

Кровавые кооп разборки с ЗЕДами. Да-да, зомби тут нет. Бригада из 1-6 выживших, пытается не отхватить люлей от мутантов, которые лезут со всех дыр, прыгают, топают, орут и визжат. В конечном итоге мутанты,  либо разваливаются на куски кровавого мяса, либо загрызают неумелый отряд по одиночке. Все это мракобесие сопровождается отличнейшим саундтреком. Со стороны это действо похоже на какое-то футуристическое шоу: отряд запускают на карту и пораундово закидывают тварей на растерзание, между раундами наши коммандос могут купить себе припасов или попросить у друг дружки денег, подлечится, пожаловаться на жизнь, обматерить напарников-нубов которые клянчат деньги. На сладкое - в последнем раунде к нам выпускают главного профессора-злодея, которого желательно закидать тапками, тряпками и другими боеприпасами. Сам профессор довольно живуч и похож на реинкарнацию терминатора с гранатометом, пулеметом и какими-то тентаклями в животе.

Este Killing Floor es un shooter cooperativo online, por lo que olvida comprarlo si sueles jugar a los juegos sólo o buscas un modo campaña con historia. El juego básicamente consiste en sobrevivir a oleadas de monstruos hasta alcanzar una oleada final dónde enfrentarse a un jefe final. Y así una y otra vez. Existe otro modo por objetivos, pero en esencia es lo mismo. 

El juego es sencillo y simple en su planteamiento, pero muy divertido y adictivo a la práctica. Hay mucha variedad de armas y de personajes que escoger. Además hay diferentes tipos de soldados cada uno con ventajas y atributos especiales que los hacen más apropiados para determinadas situaciones y el manejo de diferentes tipos de armas. 

Su modo online funciona perfectamente y es fácil encontrar servidores y jugadores pese a llevar muchos años en el mercado. 

Así pues y cómo resumen, aconsejo comprar este juego a todos los que busquen un juego simple y sencillo que les aporte grandes dosis de diversión. Además es un juego que frecuentemente está de oferta, y suele ir acompañado de contenido extra, cómo armas, escenarios o skins. 

Un saludo a todos.

Looking for a fast pace first person shooter where you can interact with a team of players or go solo for 10 action packed rounds of SURVIVAL? I've invested more hours into this game than I have L4D or any other MMO! Think I went 14 hours one day just nonstop gunning the enemy down. LOVED being a Commando or Demolition man (both are crowd control perks). So many different maps to choose from. Playing Normal can be overwhelming if you don't keep control of the enemy. Going to Hard Mode is NUTS if you don't stick to your A Game. So many tactical memories made with good friends on Killing Floor. Enjoy!

Like classic wave survival? do you like blood and gore splattering across the ground? do you perhaps enjoy the feeling of seeing an enemy fly backwards from a shotgun blast or maybe their head falling off from your katana? perhaps this game is for you. Join up with your friends or complete strangers to survive wave after wave of genetic experiements gone wrong and take out the big boss behind these experiements at the end. Have fun kids and bring plenty of ammo.

What's killing floor you ask? only perhaps the best survival horror multiplayer game you'll ever play in your entire life! Zombies? pfft, that's overrated, you fight specimens. Spray and pray? sure, but this ain't call of duty, you don't have crossairs in the bloody game! you have to use the iron sights or trust your instincts. weapons are balanced and the specimens will make your life a living hell. now to the best part: Perks, you get to be anything between a
Demolitioner: Use grenades and rockets to blast your foes!
Medic: Heal your allies from up close or distance(if they stop moving that is so i can AIM RIGHT.)
Commando: Use Automatic rifles and hunt down the invisible stalkers, it also lets you see the enemy's health bar.
Sharpshooter: Be a sniper and take out the hardest foes up far.
Pyro: Set your enemies on fire and make a barbeque!
Support: Hold more items than your teammates can, wield the doors faster and explode the specimen's face with a shotgun blast.
Berserker: Be a ninja and slice your enemies in half!
That's right, anything is possible in this game! even humor is created in some events between the year. Buy this game seriously along with 2 or 3 more friends to have more fun with it!
I've had this game installed for longer than any other game I own therefore it is the best game.

This game will show you what real team-work is.Because alone you don't stand even a tiny chance to survive,and death of one teammate often results in death of whole team.You'll need to search for a good defensive positions,block the doors,or on the countrary,stay constantly on the run-depending on circumstances.
  Also,there's money and ammo managment-if you want big gunz,and if you want them actually loaded with ammo-you need to earn them,and SURVIVE,before that.An option to drop cash for teammates really helps here.And you can heal yourself,but if someone heals you-the process will be faster,so keep that in  mind too.
  Knowing maps is crucial-it's not Quake or Counter-Strike of course,but there's plenty not-so-obvious-stuff here too.
  And,when you'd think that everything is nice and you're going for the win-there's a Final Boss of the map.This mofo can among other things, turn invisible and heal,be a sure Doom-bringer for anyone closer than twenty meters away,and also he brings a really fitting soundtrack  with him,to get you in kick-ass mood :)

Well,if you like challenges,massacres,decapitations,and tactical-team-FPSers-give it a try,you'll most certainly like it.If not-well,try it some more.This game isn't one to be awesome at first site.You'll need to taste it good,before making judgement.Also,of course competent team and a headset is required.Got both?Well,then,Happy Killing :)

The game didn't age well for sure, but still offers a hardcore shooter expierence.

The game has several classes to choose from, i recommend to actually play all of them and swap around with playstyles and weapons. See what works best for you.

Killing Floor is not just a brain dead zombie shooting game, the game will rip you a new one, especially on the higher difficulties. I would say it's like combining serious sam and left 4 dead, then you get this game kinda. 

The game has a learning curve that you need to master. Teamplay is important here, even more on higher difficulties. It works like this, you try to hold a position with your team first, when things get out of control and people die, its recommended to kite instead.

Goofy voicelines and characters also make the game very memorable.

Viciante Pakarai

有別於《惡靈勢力》那種殺僵屍的爽快感，
在《Killing Floor》中技術更佔重要的部份，在這款遊戲中人類顯得更弱小。
但也因此這款遊戲是靠技術來獲得娛樂的。
殺僵屍需要有爆頭要求才能更快殺更多僵屍，
而也是因為玩家們要比想像中的更去節省子彈以及金錢。
遊戲中通常有短(4輪)、中(7輪)、長(10輪)的區分，
因此買武器以及子彈的開銷也是非常重要的戰術考量。
喜歡接受挑戰的玩家可能會喜歡這款遊戲。
